body_html:
@xtannier Thanks for the updates! Yeah, I feel like the installation log is bit strange.. Mine was the following:

>> pip install .
Processing /private/home/weiyang/fastText
Requirement already satisfied: pybind11>=2.2 in /private/home/weiyang/.conda/envs/pytorch-master/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from fasttext==0.8.22) (2.2.3)
Requirement already satisfied: setuptools>=0.7.0 in /private/home/weiyang/.conda/envs/pytorch-master/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from fasttext==0.8.22) (39.2.0)
Requirement already satisfied: numpy in /private/home/weiyang/.conda/envs/pytorch-master/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from fasttext==0.8.22) (1.14.5)
Building wheels for collected packages: fasttext
  Running setup.py bdist_wheel for fasttext ... done
  Stored in directory: /tmp/pip-ephem-wheel-cache-m7l70u5t/wheels/f0/02/94/662fd2cafa933c0b360eec3622821c5a90abe388c6b3ef33e3
Successfully built fasttext
Installing collected packages: fasttext
Successfully installed fasttext-0.8.22

I remember you had python3.6 at your previous conda env, but this time it became python2.7? Can I see your conda list?

body:
@xtannier Thanks for the updates! Yeah, I feel like the installation log is bit strange.. Mine was the following:

```
>> pip install .
Processing /private/home/weiyang/fastText
Requirement already satisfied: pybind11>=2.2 in /private/home/weiyang/.conda/envs/pytorch-master/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from fasttext==0.8.22) (2.2.3)
Requirement already satisfied: setuptools>=0.7.0 in /private/home/weiyang/.conda/envs/pytorch-master/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from fasttext==0.8.22) (39.2.0)
Requirement already satisfied: numpy in /private/home/weiyang/.conda/envs/pytorch-master/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from fasttext==0.8.22) (1.14.5)
Building wheels for collected packages: fasttext
  Running setup.py bdist_wheel for fasttext ... done
  Stored in directory: /tmp/pip-ephem-wheel-cache-m7l70u5t/wheels/f0/02/94/662fd2cafa933c0b360eec3622821c5a90abe388c6b3ef33e3
Successfully built fasttext
Installing collected packages: fasttext
Successfully installed fasttext-0.8.22
```

I remember you had python3.6 at your previous conda env, but this time it became python2.7? Can I see your `conda list`?
